    • Method Detail

      • isDefaultPort

        public static boolean isDefaultPort(java.net.URI uri)
        Returns true if the specified URI uses a standard port (i.e. http == 80 or https == 443), false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        uri - true if the specified URI uses a standard port
        Returns:
        true if the specified URI is using a non-standard port, false otherwise

      • getFormattedDate

        public static java.lang.String getFormattedDate(java.util.Date inDate)
        Convert supplied Date object into ISO 8601 formatted date string (e.g. 2017-11-30T21:15:16Z) that Okta core supports.
        Parameters:
        inDate -
        Returns:
        ISO formatted string
